title: Summerfield, Missouri
text:
Summerfield is an <a href="unincorporated%20community">unincorporated community</a> in <a href="Maries%20County%2C%20Missouri">Maries County</a>, in the <a href="U.S.%20state">U.S. state</a> of <a href="Missouri">Missouri</a>.
History.
A post office called Summerfield was established in 1903, and remained in operation until 1957. The name is commendatory.
